translations: v．产生，引起：使某事物或情况发生、形成或产生。
· The new policy has engendered a lot of controversy.
新政策引发了很多争议。

sentences.sentence: Derivative (2007) Financial instrument or analytical tool that engendered the meltdown.
sentences.translation: 金融衍生产品(2007)：导致金融危机爆发的金融工具或分析手段。

sentences.sentence: It is precisely this characterization of women that has enabled and engendered patriarchy.
sentences.translation: 就是对女性的性格分析，激活了男性统治。
